s996: Eleven. Wei, Han, Zhao extinguished Jin, ended without descendants.
s1222: Eight. Shen Bu Hai became chancellor.
s1229: Twelve. First gathered small yi to make thirty-one xian, ordered. For fields opened qian mo.
s1301: Twenty. Feudal lords all congratulated. Met feudal lords at Ze. Court the Son of Heaven.
s1316: Two. Defeated Wei at Ma Ling. Tian Ji, Tian Ying, Tian Chou led, Sun Zi became teacher.
s1337: Twenty-four. (Qin) Da Li besieged He Yang. Xiao Gong died. Shang Jun rebelled, died at Tong Di.
s1529: Nine. Struck Qin with Han, Wei. Qi defeated us at Guan Ze.
s1554: Five. Qin pulled our Qu Wo, returned its people. Xi Shou fled to An Men.
s1562: Twelve. Chu Li Zi struck Lin Yang, captured Zhao general. Gong Zi You through enfeoffment Shu.
s1572: Seven. Struck Qi, captured Sheng Zi at Pu. Struck Yan with Qin.
s1833: Thirteen. Qin pulled our An Cheng, troops reached Da Liang then returned.
s1859: Twenty-seven. Struck Zhao, beheaded thirty thousand. Earth shook, damaged city.
s1863: Nineteen. Qin struck us, gave Qin Han Bei and Shang Yong land.
s1877: Twenty-nine. Bai Qi struck Chu, pulled Ying, then east to Jing Ling, made Nan Jun.
s1881: Twenty-one. Qin pulled our Ying, burned Yi Ling, wang fled went to Chen.
s1905: Two. Qin pulled our two cities, army under Da Liang, Han came to rescue, made peace with Qin at Wen.
s1997: Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang first year. Qin pulled our three cities. Ping Yuan Jun chancellor.
s2246: Ten. Chancellor Lu Bu Wei dismissed. Qi, Zhao came, set up wine. Tai Hou entered Xian Yang. Great search.
s2255: Eleven. Lu Bu Wei of He Nan. Wang Jian struck Ye, Yan Yu, took nine cities.
s2264: Twelve. Sent four jun troops assisted Wei struck Chu. Lu Bu Wei died. Again restored Lao Ai retainers moved Shu.
s2273: Thirteen. Huan Yi struck Ping Yang, killed Zhao Hu Zhe, beheaded one hundred thousand, then east struck. Zhao Wang of He Nan. Comet appeared.
s2276: Two. Qin pulled our Ping Yang, defeated Hu Zhe, . beheaded one hundred thousand.
s2307: Seventeen. Attacked Han, took Yang Cheng, Fu Shu. Broke Zhao army.
s2313: Seventeen. Han Wang gave land submitted seal, requested to be vassal minister, sent Han Fei to visit. Qin people detained Fei, then killed him.
s2318: Eighteen. Han Fei envoy to Qin, Qin killed Fei.
s2322: Nineteen. Huan Yi attacked Zhao, defeated Zhao army at Ping Yang.
s2342: Twenty-two. Wang Jian attacked Chu, took Chen south to Ping Yu.
s2346: Fourteen. Qin pulled our Chen south to Ping Yu.
s2360: Twenty-four. Wang Jian attacked Chu, broke Chu army, beheaded thirty thousand.
s2372: Thirty-four. Qin took our Yan Ying.
